```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(visdat)
library(dlookr)
```

```{r}
## Lectura de una base de datos tipo ".csv"
bdInternet <- read.csv("BD_Completa.csv", encoding = "UTF-8")

bdInternet <- bdInternet %>%
  mutate(TEST_DATE = as.Date(TEST_DATE, "%m/%d/%Y %H:%M"))
```

```{r}
get_class(bdInternet)
```
